title: Remember Me
description: This is an updated cover edition released 5/2013 for ASIN: B00BIL0F8W  Remember Me is a romantic mystery, steeped in magic and seasoned with southern flair...and a dash of Steampunk on the side.If you could change the events of time, what would you have to worry about...besides consequences? Joey is a nineteen-year-old girl from rural Arkansas who has inherited a very special gift, a gift for manipulating time and changing things. Threading events to ensure outcomes are more desirable, life is relatively normal until she begins to hear an enchanting male voice in her head. He tells her he needs her help. Before she finds him, she will have to trust him. Torn between dark and light threads, Joey must find a way to unravel things. To do this she must focus on one truth: Love keeps us safe, makes us complete - whole. Everything happens for a reason and behind every reason...is a Weaver.Remember Me is Book 1 in the Weaver Series
author: Dena Nicotra
